name: ÆTHERIS
description:
For decades, the Wilderness has been a ravaged and hostile land. Monsters multiply, corruption spreads to the plants, and the few Vazards who dare to venture out of their village do so armed to the teeth.
In the north, mysterious masked creatures spread terror. And in the south, it is said that a dark power lurks in the mountains...



Ætheris is a roguelite adventure game mixing combat, exploration and tactics. You must travel through the Wilderness to find a way to save your village and its inhabitants from certain extinction. Battle monsters, meet the other vazard tribes, form alliances or choose to go it alone.
Each traveller who enters the Wilderness will experience a unique adventure, shaped by their decisions, the vagaries of fate and... the influence of mysterious beings.


  • Set out to discover the Wilderness, choosing the paths and decisions to take. You are responsible for the fate of your people: the fate of your entire village is in your hands.
  • Explore the unique landscapes of the island that will unfold before your eyes.
  • Events will spice up your journey. Choose wisely: your choices will have an impact on the rest of the story!
    [Each choice corresponds to a character trait and will shape the character's personality for future events. Who knows how this will affect their behaviour later on?
  • Fight wild creatures using your skills strategically, in turn-based battles.
  • Pay attention to the advice of the spirits... They will guide you to salvation.
  • Exodus Mode: The Shadow is spreading through the Wilderness, devouring everything in its path. Before it's too late, race against time to find a way to evacuate your village


The world of Ætheris is unlike any other.
Explore a strange universe in an unforgettable and colourful graphic environment, in a post-apocalyptic medieval jungle atmosphere.
